FuncDef:
The display mpls te tunnel statistics command displays the number and status of MPLS TE tunnels.
The display mpls te gmpls tunnel statistics command displays GMPLS UNI tunnel statistics.
CLIs: display mpls te gmpls tunnel statistics
Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te gmpls tunnel statistics
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view GMPLS UNI tunnel statistics, run the display mpls te gmpls tunnel statistics command. The command output contains the number of GMPLS UNI tunnels in each state.
To view MPLS TE tunnel statistics, run the display mpls te tunnel statistics command. The command output contains the number of MPLS TE tunnels in each state.
